articles.title: U.S. AAA debt rating gets a downgrade by Fitch; credit agency sees U.S. economy likely to slip into recession
articles.content: Fitch Ratings cut its top credit ratings for the U.S. to AA+ from AAA on Tuesday, pointing to 'erosion' of governance and the nation‚Äôs expected fiscal deterioration over the next three years, but also a likely recession.

articles.title: If You Bet $100 On Lionel Messi To Score In His First 2 MLS Games, Here's How Much You Made
articles.content:
Soccer superstar Lionel Messi joined Inter Miami of the Major League Soccer league in a move that came as a surprise to many.
In his first two games playing for Miami, Messi has scored three goals and has one assist. Here‚Äôs a look at how bettors have done backing the Argentine¬†superstar.
What Happened: Messi made his debut for Inter Miami in the Leagues Cup with Inter Miami facing off against Cruz Azul on July 21.
In the game, Messi came on as a substitute and scored the game winning goal for Inter Miami, who won 2-1.
Messi drew his first start for Inter Miami on July 25 with Inter Miami defeating Atlanta United 4-0. In the game, Messi had two goals and an assist.
Bettors who wagered on Messi to score an anytime goal would have cashed bets in both games. Bettors who took their winnings from the first game and rolled them into the second Messi match would have done even better.
With odds of -125 to score a ...

articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq start August lower while Apple, Amazon earnings and jobs data loom this week
articles.content: U.S. stocks traded mostly lower Tuesday, pulling back from 16-month highs and a five-month winning streak, while in a wait-and-see mode ahead of jobs numbers and major technology company earnings reports later this week.

articles.title: Amazon & Apple Earnings: What to Expect
articles.content: So far, the Q2 cycle has been positive, helping reassure investors and boosting overall sentiment. Now, it's time for heavyweights Apple and Amazon to report. What can investors expect?

articles.title: Apple (AAPL) to Report Q3 Earnings: What's in the Offing?
articles.content: Apple's (AAPL) third-quarter fiscal 2023 results are likely to have benefited from an expanding installed base of devices, despite macroeconomic headwinds and unfavorable forex.

articles.title: Apple Could Return to Growth Later This Year
articles.content: The tech giant's revenue trends improved earlier this year. Can this persist?

articles.title: Here's How Apple Could Win Big From AI
articles.content: The tech giant reportedly developed an AI model, and that could be good news for investors in the long run.

articles.title: 2 Green Flags and 1 Red Flag for Honeywell After Its Post-Earnings Sell-Off
articles.content: Despite strong results, Honeywell stock is under pressure.

articles.title: 3 Tips on How to Steer Clear of "Value Traps"
articles.content: Sometimes, when you pay for a "cheap stock," you get what you pay for. Strategist Andrew Rocco explains how to avoid value traps.
